website_summaries.verdict: A sophisticated wooden magazine rack that adds a touch of class to any space.
cons: Many users do not find the drop-leaf table to be functional

customer_reviews.title: It fell completely apart out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: As I pulled it out of the box, I had to rush it to the floor because it was coming apart. After I laid it down, the first picture shows the result. The second picture shows some globs of glue along the top edge. This is the sorriest purchase I have ever made through Amazon. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: J. Melko

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is th the perfect magazine rack and drop leaf table. The rack is large enough to store multiple books and magazines and the table is just the right size to keep current reading out and my Kindle. It arrived earlier than expected and in perfect condition
customer_reviews.author: Glenda

customer_reviews.title: Winsome Wood = Quality Furniture Pieces!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this used, like new and it was exactly as described! The box a little damaged as advertised but the item was in perfect condition! All of my living room furniture is from Winsome Wood and I am beyond impressed!! Every item of theirs I’ve ever bought is great quality for affordable prices. The dark espresso is beautiful and it’s a great addition to the rest of my living room set!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Russell

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LOOKING AND HIGH QUALITY MAGAZINE RACK WITH MANY PURPOSES!
customer_reviews.text: My husband plays guitar and has songbook binders and miscellaneous things sitting on the floor by his chair. Even when he had them stacked nicely it still looks like clutter. I came upon this magazine rack and liked the looks and the price so I ordered one. I gotta say, it looks so nice that months later I ordered a second one for me! We don't use the drop leaf table much, but it does come in handy once in a while! The racks are great looking and high quality!
customer_reviews.author: Elnz237

customer_reviews.title: Nice Magazine Rack... worthless "drop leaf table" :(
customer_reviews.text: I should have taken a better look at the product description on the bottom of the screen (with the exact measurements). I assumed, after looking at the photo and reading it was a "drop leaf table" (that could hold drinks), it would be the height of an end table. This really is a nice newspaper/magazine rack, but it's much too small to keep the "drop leaf" open or it looks odd; it's just too short for a table. I honestly believe the "drop leaf" is an extra that unnecessarily adds to the cost and is useless. I gave it four stars, because it is a reasonably priced magazine rack.
customer_reviews.author: Meema of Eight

customer_reviews.title: An immediate fit for us
customer_reviews.text: Within minutes this magazine rack was a doing its job. If fits the space we had for it and functions better than expected holding some of the wife's needlepoint in progress as well as newspapers and magazines. The feel is sturdy without being too heavy. There is a swing arm/leg to hold the drop leaf in place and keep it steady. We would have liked more finishes/colors from which to choose but black does match everything. The Winsome Wood Magazine Rack with Drop Leaf Table, Dark Espresso Finish has been a happy purchase.
customer_reviews.author: PhredTop Contributor: Manga

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking
customer_reviews.text: I reall y like this magazine rack. I was afraid I would have to assemble something but it comes all put together. Very rich looking and functional .
customer_reviews.author: melody j rea

customer_reviews.title: Works great for magazines and for my 91 year old mother ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great for magazines and for my 91 year old mother to put a drink, TV changer and Kleenex box on. It sits in front of a mahogany lamp table and saves the antique table from getting damaged. It is very sturdy and blends well with other furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret C.

customer_reviews.title: All the pieces fell apart when I took it out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: The wood was a nice heavy wood. However this was suppose to require no assembly. It obviously was put together badly. No 2 pieces were stuck together. We had to fully assemble ourselves and add glue for it to stay together. For the cost of the item I would have expected better
customer_reviews.author: Ron T.

customer_reviews.title: Coffee and magazines
customer_reviews.text: Very useful, space for my magazines and shelf for my coffee. I must combination for lazy mornings.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Clio

customer_reviews.title: Small and Low
customer_reviews.text: Table is really low. I was hoping that the table part slid up and lay over the magazine side. Having it functionally two sided is difficult because the table is small and very low and you can't easily put it against another piece of furniture. It is very well made and sturdy, though!
customer_reviews.author: MsBunnie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful magazine rack
customer_reviews.text: It was well made , looks really nice in our updated living room.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy neary

customer_reviews.title: totally misrepresented re delivery
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the picture and writeup of this product. However, it arrived unassembled, lacking instructions for assembly, glue smeared over pieces indicating it was previously used and assembly attempted. I really wanted this magazine rack but am terribly upset that it isn't usable due to the delivery condition.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja A.

customer_reviews.title: The Drop leaf construction is subpar
customer_reviews.text: When we received the “Winsome Wood Magazine Rack with Drop Leaf Table” we found that the drop leaf was not attached to the magazine rack. Once we remove everything from the box we found that all of the screws had all pull out of the particle board material and was lying loose in the box. The rack is very pretty so we decided to use it without the drop leaf. At a minimum the size of the screws need to be increased and better support during shipping would help. It would be better if the drop leaf was assembled by the customer and not in the factory.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Pennington

customer_reviews.title: no stars if i could!
customer_reviews.text: The workmanship on this product is appalling. The paint was scraped off at the edges, the nails/screws were yanked out of the wood, and large chunks taken from the sides. Either I've been sent someone elses return or its just a shoddy product.
customer_reviews.author: Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Completely collapsed at all joints upon removing from box.
customer_reviews.text: Completely fell apart right out of the box. It is glued together (pegs, holes, glue) -- no screws except for drop leaf piece. Only reason it gets one star is that the design and height is what I need for a special circumstance, and the wood/finish is of good weight and not cheap-looking.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Hensarling

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive color description and Picture.
customer_reviews.text: Why not describe this piece as gloss black finish. The picture shown is more of a cherrywood look which is why I purchased it. The construction is ok. What I would expect for the price. But the black gloss paint finish is not what is shown in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Landon

customer_reviews.title: We ended up returning that one as well because it wasn't easy for my husband to put the drop leaf up ...
customer_reviews.text: The first one came damaged, so we returned for a replacement. We ended up returning that one as well because it wasn't easy for my husband to put the drop leaf up and down.
customer_reviews.author: Becky M.

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is sitting right nest to my leather rocker/recliner in my living room. It is a perfect addition to my reading "nook." It is even the same color as my chair. Table is easy to open and close. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mosaic Melody

customer_reviews.title: ... have a table on the other side) i'm very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: I had beenl looking for something to place next to my chair/ ( I have a table on the other side) i'm very pleased with it. Linda
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product when I got it in February. It looked great and I loved the table top. However 8 mos. later it is lying on my living room floor. I guess the wood glue gave way or something, because I tried to move it and it just fell apart.
customer_reviews.author: cokeskb

customer_reviews.title: Screwless construction!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this magazine rack a couple of weeks ago and promptly filled it with magazines. Yesterday when I moved it to vacuum under it,it came apart in six pieces. What a mess!! This product is totally glued together.......NOT ONE-SCREW!!!! So I would rate the construction of this product as SHODDY!!!! Luckily I have a friend who will reassemble it and use screws and glue to do it. Shame on the company who made this magazine rack!!!!$
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Willoughby

customer_reviews.title: It's the perfect chair-side table for me
customer_reviews.text: It's the perfect chair-side table for me. I love to color for stress relief so all of my coloring books and pencils are nicely organized and so easy to reach.
customer_reviews.author: B. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Not what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly as expected. Drop leaf has a leg that folds out to hold it up and it didn't look like we thought it would. Amazon was helpful in processing a return and refunding.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Kress

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: This thing literally fell apart in my hands. You can see that they glue and used wood pegs to hold pieces together and still fell apart. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Prevas

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: much, much smaller than i had though it was going to be, but still serves its purpose
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Poorly Constructed!
customer_reviews.text: Poorly constructed. Rack came apart and I had to clue it back together with super clue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Next to my chair today
customer_reviews.text: This hold all my fishing and hunting catalogs. Plus model railroad books, and motorcycle mags. Add my glasses to the leaf and they are where I need them all the time, plus a big glass of water what else do I need while watching TV
customer_reviews.author: ScttBvr

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: Nice piece of furniture! Good quality and weight. Bought it for my husband to sit bedside to hold his laptop and organize paperwork. Very satisfied. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: N Toft

customer_reviews.title: We don't use the table top but it looks like it would work well
customer_reviews.text: Works well for magazines and my husbands lap top. We don't use the table top but it looks like it would work well.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice magazine rack!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice magazine rack. I really like the little table top that you can have out or folded away. I was also happy that I didn't have to assemble it! Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: mochapie

customer_reviews.title: Poor assembly
customer_reviews.text: Functional and comes fully assembled, until it falls apart. Dowels snapped in half, must be drilled out to replace. A real headache.
customer_reviews.author: Janis Woodard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! It's also a nice size and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: SMWATW77

customer_reviews.title: great forthe price...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice as pictured...glad we did not have to put it together...arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: T. Mason

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Wood
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful color, but the wood is cheap quality. When the whole thing arrived, - box intact! - the rack was broken!
customer_reviews.author: K. Striegel

customer_reviews.title: The Rack is shorter than I expected but is still ...
customer_reviews.text: The Rack is shorter than I expected but is still functional and serves one of the purpose for which I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Tish Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: A bit smaller than I thought, but a very nice piece of furniture to keep your magazine and papers organized.
customer_reviews.author: RealPagan

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in my living room
customer_reviews.text: Came assembled. Looks great in my living room. Lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: Always Critical

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Mag rack, very well built, will last a lifetime
customer_reviews.author: Gerard Hungerman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked the capacity and the leaf , that can be folded down. It was a good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: anna lopez

customer_reviews.title: Storage AND a table!
customer_reviews.text: We needed magazine storage in our bathroom, PLUS a drop leaf to set the morning coffee cup! The leaf drops when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Decent product at a super price. Does the job and met expectations. No regrets ... we purchased a second ...
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Quality rack
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for household magazines. Found a use for the arm that lifts up....its beautiful wood.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonPrimeMemberoCa

customer_reviews.title: disappointment
customer_reviews.text: This item was purchased through Amazon as a gift. The magazine rack arrived properly packaged, but the table top fell off after removing it from the box. Screws were missing from the table and there were some nicks in the wood. It appeared that the item was packed damaged and not due to shipping. It was a hassle to repack and haul to the post office for return. My refund took 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The idea is good, but it fell apart after six months.
customer_reviews.author: Film Lover

customer_reviews.title: Handsome piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking and sturdy. I like that it has two separate compartments. The flip top is nice though I don't know how you would use it. It's too heavy to put on your lap.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Damaged upon delivery
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was fine. No visible damage. I opened the box to make sure the item was OK. The screws to the pop-up tray were floating around the box and the tray itself was cocked to one side. 2 Stars only because Amazon customer service is great!!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice strong rack. Quality work. Perfect replacement for our old rack.
customer_reviews.author: JFD

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Better than we expected. Perfect size for our Motorhome. Couldn't believe the quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: DFM

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is nice. Very heavy and great to store things.
customer_reviews.author: R. Tompkins

customer_reviews.title: looks really nice..
customer_reviews.text: looks really nice....enjoy how nice and neat the magazines look in it
customer_reviews.author: Karen Pennell

customer_reviews.title: not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: It is not dark brown as the picture shows. Its actually black. There was only one hinge screwed in. The other was in the box with no screws. Lucky that my husband had similar screws. No return slip in the box either, so I could not send it back, or give it as a gift as I had intended. So now I have it.
customer_reviews.author: disappointed customer

customer_reviews.title: it arrived with one screw missing, and it has ...
customer_reviews.text: it arrived with one screw missing, and it has hardly any space in it, i need to constantly remove magazines to make room for new ones
customer_reviews.author: E. Gross

customer_reviews.title: Magazine Rack
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that it came assembled. It was well packed and there didn't seem to be any scratches. It was shorter than I expected, but it is serving the purpose for which I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: C.S.

customer_reviews.title: Winsome Wood Magazine Rack with Drop Leaf Table
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my wife. It is great for storage of magazines and the fold out table is great when watching TV.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff-in-PA

customer_reviews.title: Great Price and Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: Works very well at holding magazines, and it looks great sitting next to my recliner. The only bad thing was the color; in the picture it looks like a dark cherry wood color, but it is very very dark brown, practically black.
customer_reviews.author: gringo2004

customer_reviews.title: awsome
customer_reviews.text: very nice-good quality. Perfect for living room, den, bedroom or bathroom. side table comes in handy many times. great item
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Leino

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am totally satisfied. It does exactly what I wanted and the product was in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Perry Johnson

customer_reviews.title: This is great I have my laptop on the table part and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great I have my laptop on the table part and my books inside. It works well, it is sturdy and I love it. I have had this about 2 months. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Barclay

customer_reviews.title: I Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and height to sit next to my rocker to hold remote, TV schedule, etc.. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Leaf only Drops
customer_reviews.text: It's a good thing I never intended to use the drop leaf feature. There was no hardware in the box to make the drop leaf stay horizontal. Other than that, it is an attractive, study magazine rack.
customer_reviews.author: M Joy Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: there WERE HUGE SCRATCHES ON THE FRONT OF THE FURNITURE. VERY DISAPPOINTING!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my room looking neat
customer_reviews.text: I got this to keep the papers and books around my lounger out of sight. It works beautifully! And everything is right at my fingertips. It would be perfect if it were 6 inches taller. But it works just fine as it is.
customer_reviews.author: grover hahn

customer_reviews.title: Good organizer
customer_reviews.text: It looks goods and serves my purpose. Great for holding papers, tablets and other things.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Winsome Wood Magazine Rack Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for something small to place beside the recliner that would hold a beverage and books. This was the perfect size and the color was very nice, craftsmanship is solid. Great find!!
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Cupper

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived fully assembled and in great shape. It is sturdy wood with a nice dark color. It looks great next to our chaise lounge in our bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: StAugust

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Addition to our Livingroom
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this magazine rack for next to my husband's recliner and we absolutely love it. It is very sturdy and came already assembled. The tray is also nice for added convenience. Overall it was a great buy and works great in our living room.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Ciavaglia

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The product arrrived within two days after placing the order. But the leaf was broken near the hinge and that showed the poor quality of the wood (pressed wood) chosen to make the magazine rack and the leaf. The packing was even worse. For such a fragile piece I would expect the packing to be better. Just a plastic foil was wrapped around the piece and placed in a big box with no filler. That kind of shipping will damage any item placed inside. Completely disppointed with the product quality and shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Regular

customer_reviews.title: Great product for yourself or a gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter. She was very pleased with the color, size and workmanship. Received it in a timely fashion.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Madison

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: However, it had a visible chip on the bottom which I was able to repair.
customer_reviews.author: JACQUELINE

customer_reviews.title: Magazine Rack
customer_reviews.text: I was quite disappointed in this rack. I didn't like the way the lid opened. plus it came damaged. Sorry to say, I returned the rack..
customer_reviews.author: Sandra L

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for music storage.
customer_reviews.text: This arrived well pack and helps with all the music next to the piano. Matches the rest of he wood in the room.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: Its strong and add lot of character to my living room. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jack S.

customer_reviews.title: so I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the top broke off of it the first time we tried to use it. I did not save my receipt, so I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ELM

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a classy lil magazine rack...and that's exactly what I got!!! This was one of the best purchases I've made lately. It arrived on time, came assembled, and looks great in my apt! Happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: o.j.

customer_reviews.title: glad I didn't pay attention to that review
customer_reviews.text: I was scared at first to order after seeing someone put that their magazine rack came all scratched up and a chuck of wood missing. Well....glad I didn't pay attention to that review. Because mine came in perfect condition. Just love the table to easily fold up when I need something to put my drink on. Or a snack. And it folds back down just as easily as it did going up. Modern looking!!! I just love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Comes assembled, falls apart
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a good deal when it arrived all assembled and ready to use, but once I put a few magazines in place if fell apart. We were able to put it back together with some wood glue and some clamps. Would not buy this again and don’t recommend it for you either. Not a good value.
customer_reviews.author: BeccaM

customer_reviews.title: FELL APART AFTER 6 WEEKS!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: this literally happened--- i am personally thankful for the service of AMAZON to compensate.... my advice pass on this good looking but cheap table and find another one here on Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: lcj

customer_reviews.title: I like the look of the magazine rack
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this magazine rack for myself & was very excited about the idea of the added table. However, the magazine rack literally fell apart once I got it assembled. I had to glue the sides back on and the kick stand that holds the table up just fell off. The screws were broken off inside the wood. My husband had to drill what was left of the screws out. He and I had to rebuild the entire thing. I like the look of the magazine rack, but I would not recommend the product. It is very cheaply made!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Clunky
customer_reviews.text: It does what I needed it to and matches the cabinets in my bathroom. It is kind of clunky but it will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: KATHLEEN EVANS

customer_reviews.title: Support for table top is a bit fragile as I ...
customer_reviews.text: Support for table top is a bit fragile as I pulled it to move it on the carpet... the screw came out of the wood. Thus mine is decorated with duct tape but nobody notices... or even cares.
customer_reviews.author: The Ground Pounder

customer_reviews.title: Decent product for cost
customer_reviews.text: Cool little rack, came assembled which was a nice surprise. Arrived as described and expected.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: and quite nicely, too
customer_reviews.text: As we are part of that vanishing breed who still gets a couple of newspapers delivered everyday, plus a few magazines per month, having a place to keep the table tops reasonably clear is important. This product does the job; and quite nicely, too. Had the top "lid" folded over the top, as opposed to off to the side, I might have given it the full five stars.
customer_reviews.author: W. R. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Nice magazine rack
customer_reviews.text: WE ahve had several magazine racks and tend to really test them by piling up reading material to catch up on all at once. Previous holders have not had the substantial construction to do the job without failing. This one has. Besides it has a nice look and feel. Finish was not that of fine furniture but okay for the task. Our order arrived on time as anticipated with Amazon Prime.
customer_reviews.author: Sailor

customer_reviews.title: very pleased. looks classy in our livingroom and the drop ...
customer_reviews.text: very pleased . looks classy in our livingroom and the drop leaf side table is strong and sturdy . comes fully assembled and has 2 compartments for books , notebooks , magazines....whatever you want it to be. holds alot. Thank You for fast shipping ! ordered it one day...in stock and shipped out the very next day . Very Pleased with this product well worth the money .
customer_reviews.author: B . Rosario

customer_reviews.title: EUREKA!!!
customer_reviews.text: What at magazine rack!! It's perfect for my living room. It even has a little table for whatever you need to place on it instead of the floor. I just love it! I received it today and it required NO ASSEMBLY. Right out of the box, it was improving my husband's cluttered area around his lounge chair. It's just the right size. I have ordered another one for me and my needlepoint. Whomever designed this magazine rack should receive an award. It is FABULOUS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Celeste

customer_reviews.title: Does the job--decent for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad product for the price. It is a nice looking piece. I would recommend it to anyone who simply wants something nice to keep the clutter off an end table. The leaf isn't that strong, but it's not really meant to be. It's okay to put a book or cup of liquid on it, but if there isn't anything in the side to balance out the weight, it will fall over. Just use common sense and you will like this product.
customer_reviews.author: TammyB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our purpose!
customer_reviews.text: We needed something to store our current magazines in, and set our laptop computer on. The issue was we had limited space between one of our reclining chairs, an end table, and the wall. This unit fit perfectly as it doesn't take up much space, plus it holds the magazines and my laptop perfectly! Nice quality, and it is indeed a dark coffee brown. I would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Reader from MN

customer_reviews.title: Form and Function!
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what I needed it to do. Great looking and good value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is compact and subtle while offering me a place to set a drinking glass and the remotes when I’m in my recliner. Quality seems good.
customer_reviews.author: eLLe Tee

customer_reviews.title: piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: this piece arrived looking like it had been put together once taken apart and returned. I am returning this product to say it is substandard is an understatement. there is what appears to be glue around the hole for the dowels. The towels themselves were all broken and not usable. the wood is scratched and in one area appears to have purple nail polish on it. I will NOT purchase this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia G. Justice

customer_reviews.title: a warning
customer_reviews.text: When I got this the lid was broken off. It exposed the bare wood which not much more than compressed paper. I should have paid attention to the other reviews. If it had been better made it would have been just what I was wanting. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Willow L.

customer_reviews.title: Seems pretty sturdy compared to several I've tried on other sites!
customer_reviews.text: It was nice for the magazine rack to come assembled! The color is Espresso as described. The Drop leaf table is a nice little bit of extra room. The magazine rack came in two days as ordered!
customer_reviews.author: Rosanne DeCamillo

customer_reviews.title: Works for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Holds everything I need it to hold. The shelf is an added bonus. High quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good magazine rack
customer_reviews.text: This was good for the price, getting real wood instead of MDF was a nice surprise. Nice dark color, I'd had difficulty locating one in this color, and really wanted one that looked darker like this. The drop leaf is very handy, nice to have. I'm very satisfied with mine.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer Type Person

customer_reviews.title: Really nice-sturdy and good looking
customer_reviews.text: This little bookcase cum table serves the purpose intended for us. About 10-12 kids books fit in this one (which is why we bought it). Alon with that, we can use to put our coffee cups etc on the little foldin stand. We've kept this in our family room. The quality of wood is great and the finish also. hIGHLY recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Espresso Magazine Rack
customer_reviews.text: My magazine rack came promptly, well-packed, assembled, and in perfect condition. The finish is smooth and the color is consistent in a very dark espresso. It works very well to organize my books and magazines beside my recliner, freeing up the table on the other side that was formerly cluttered all the time. I do not have room to use the fold-away table on the magazine rack because it makes it about 10" wider. I'm sure I'll use it sometime when I rearrange furniture or move it to another room. I definitely recommend this product. I've always had good experiences ordering from Amazon.com.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Well made and attractive
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little rack with a flip top shelf. It comes in one piece so there is no assembly as with so many wood products these days. My only "complaint" is that I wish it was a little taller, for using the shelf - that would be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: This is a fine, cozy piece of furniture
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine, cozy piece of furniture. Fits in perfectly within a small space. Would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful item for books, magazines, and I have it sitting next to my bed at night, cause I read a good bit. It came assembled, so no hassle, and the packaging was great! Now I don't know what I would do without it!
customer_reviews.author: autumn wolf

product_meta.title: Winsome Wood Magazine Rack with Drop Leaf Table, Dark Espresso Finish
product_meta.description: This solid/composite wood magazine rack has two slots to hold several magazines, newspapers, and your current novel, while also providing a flat surface on which to rest a drink or a plate that folds away when not in use. Contemporary Espresso finish. However, the product may appear black in an environment where lighting is dim and insufficient.
feature_bullets: Drop leaf table holds drinks, etc
2 storage pockets for magazines, books, newspapers
The product may appear black in an environment where lighting is dim and insufficient.
